name: Backup Scripts
description: A collection of shell scripts for automated Git backups of Obsidian vault and personal documents

conventions.errorHandling: Use set -e for script failures, check return codes for critical operations
conventions.logging: Log to logs/ directory with timestamps
conventions.configuration: Use config.sh for all configurable paths and settings

testing.notes: Manual testing required for backup scripts - verify backups complete successfully

environment.launchd: macOS launch agents for scheduled backups
